Support ESUG

The European Smalltalk Users Group (ESUG) performs many actions to promote Smalltalk use in both industry and academia. You can support ESUG by helping for such actions. In this case, please get in touch with the ESUG board. If you don't have time to participate to ESUG activities you can:

  • donate some money through our PayPal account.
  • become a Sponsor

Pay an ESUG's invoice through PayPal
